content: the court has made a final ruling in a legal case regarding the dissolution of a community inheritance the court declared that the property should be divided among the parties involved one party was granted exclusive ownership of certain properties and a sum of money while the remaining movable property and money were divided among other parties the court referred to specific laws and codes in making the decision in a separate order the court partially granted the claims made by the plaintiffs in relation to their deceased fathers estate the court determined the amount that one party should contribute to the estate and delegated the operations to an investigating judge the judge received written notes from the parties and decided not to proceed with conciliation the court also determined the division of the estate and appointed a notary public to oversee the process the court has made a final decision regarding the community inheritance case disposing of the inheritance according to a lawful will the court granted the application for division and assigned exclusive ownership of various properties and assets to the parties involved including a sum of money movable property and real estate the court also ordered the reimbursement of all costs related to the legal proceedings the decision was made on december 28 2020
